name: Stealth Stinky
description:
How long can you fart?

Very simple and extremely addicting!

Choose your character and...
Your aim is to fart accurate so your neighbour can't hear you farting.
Do it when there's cars passing by on the street.
The longer you hold on the more scores you get!


Game features highlights:

- two characters
- day and night stages
- bright and very cool graphics
- great sounds
- game center
